mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(log_history.update_date, '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i') AS update_date, log_history.display_name AS display_name_code, log_history.operation_type AS operation_type_code, DATE_FORMAT(log_history.stamp_time, '%H:%i') AS stamp_time, CONCAT_WS(' ', COALESCE(emp.first_name, ''), COALESCE(emp.last_name, '')) AS employee_name, CONCAT_WS(' ', COALESCE(emp2.first_name, ''), COALESCE(emp2.last_name, '')) AS update_employee_name FROM log_history LEFT JOIN employee AS emp ON log_history.employee_id = emp.id LEFT JOIN employee AS emp2 ON log_history.update_employee_id = emp2.id WHERE log_history.update_date >= CONCAT(#{year}, '-', LPAD(#{month}, 2, '0'), '-01 00:00:00') AND log_history.update_date < DATE_ADD(CONCAT(#{year}, '-', LPAD(#{month}, 2, '0'), '-01'), INTERVAL 1 MONTH) ORDER BY log_history.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO log_history ( display_name, operation_type, stamp_time, employee_id, update_employee_id, update_date ) VALUES ( #{display_name}, #{operation_type}, #{stamp_time}, #{employee_id}, #{update_employee_id}, #{update_date} )
